New Records: Tarik Skubal struck out six batters and did not allow an earned run over six innings.
The Detroit Tigers secured their first playoff win since 2013.
Key Match Events: The Tigers led 3-1 entering the ninth inning.
Houston had the bases loaded in the ninth but couldn't capitalize with a decisive hit.
Pre-Game Insights: The Astros were on a franchise-record 10 consecutive playoff openers.
Tarik Skubal, the AL pitching Triple Crown winner, was key for the Tigers.
Post-Match Reflections: Houston manager Joe Espada praised Skubal's performance.
Detroit Tigers manager expressed relief at the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The second game was scheduled for the next day.
Yordan Alvarez returned from injury and played a role in the game.
